channel.title: Owner Yell
channel.description:
Hello everyone I only got a admin and owner Yell on my server can anyone help to make me one maybe also a Co-owner yell thanks. -Im Bad in english soz.
Greetz

item.title: Owner Yell
item.dc:creator: @t0n_t1n t0n t1n
item.description:
@t0n_t1n wrote:

if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("PLAYERNAME")) { c2.sendMessage("<shad=9440238>[CUSTOM TITLE]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");

declare this if statement under the yell command, and you can have custom titles, or

}else if (c.playerRights == 3){ c2.sendMessage("<col=255><shad=15695415>[Owner/Co-Owner]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");

or you can use that one, or mess around with it and have it to player rights, or donator rights.

I could give you my whole yell command if you’d like, has several custom titles for significant people on my server, and playerrights and isDonator titles

Read full topic
